events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills mentioned in your resume.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case to guide you through the technical interview and subsequent steps smoothly.
Your technical expertise and background were reviewed during the initial screening; we are proceeding with the next stages of your application process.
Thank you for your prompt response to our screening questions; this helps us ensure alignment on technical expectations.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM UTC; please prepare to discuss your prior engineering projects and problem-solving approaches.
The technical interview was completed successfully, showcasing strong software development skills and a solid understanding of system design.
Your HR interview is scheduled for May 15th at 9 AM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and other employment details.
The HR interview was completed on time with a positive conversation regarding your expectations and career growth within the Engineering team.
We have sent you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, including compensation details and expected start date.
We have received your feedback on the offer with questions about growth opportunities and are ready to provide further clarifications.
You have accepted the offer. We are excited to have you join our Engineering team and look forward to your onboarding process.
Your onboarding process has started with an introduction to the development tools, team members, and company policies.
The recruitment case for the Software Engineer role has been successfully closed with you onboarded and integrated into the team.
